Detailed Description

A pie chart data source.

Member Function Documentation

NSString * CPTPieChartDataSource-p::legendTitleForPieChart:recordIndex: ( CPTPieChart *  pieChart,
[recordIndex] NSUInteger  index 
) [virtual]

Gets the legend title for the given pie chart slice.

Parameters:
pieChartThe pie chart.
indexThe data index of interest.
Returns:
The title text for the legend entry for the point with the given index. If this method is not implemented or returns nil, the legend will get the title from the corresponding data label if it is a CPTTextLayer.
CGFloat CPTPieChartDataSource-p::radialOffsetForPieChart:recordIndex: ( CPTPieChart *  pieChart,
[recordIndex] NSUInteger  index 
) [optional, virtual]

Offsets the slice radially from the center point. Can be used to "explode" the chart.

Parameters:
pieChartThe pie chart.
indexThe data index of interest.
Returns:
The radial offset in view coordinates. Zero is no offset.
CPTFill * CPTPieChartDataSource-p::sliceFillForPieChart:recordIndex: ( CPTPieChart *  pieChart,
[recordIndex] NSUInteger  index 
) [optional, virtual]

Gets a fill for the given pie chart slice. This method is optional.

Parameters:
pieChartThe pie chart.
indexThe data index of interest.
Returns:
The pie slice fill for the slice with the given index.
